summary: A small fix for mods causing the steel nordic gauntlets to be displayed between the player's feet when equipped.
descriptionHtml:
This mod fixes the Steel Nordic Gauntlets ONLY. It fixes an issue where the gauntlets are displayed between the player's/npcs' feet when equipped, leaving the hands invisible due to another mod conflict. I've noticed a few mods cause this, so I felt an upload was...worthy, for lack of a better word. 

Load at the VERY bottom of the load order (last), to make sure it overwrites ANYTHING causing this issue. 

Again, this fixes ONLY the Steel Nordic Gauntlets. All others can be fixed as I find conflicts/upon request. 

Requires:
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
All DLC ESMs
[s]DragonborngalleryNEW.esm from "Legacy of the Dragonborn" [/s]([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52248/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52248/?[/url])[s] (I MIGHT be able to remove this later, but having tried such, causes the .esp to be ineffective)[/s] 


UPDATE to v1.1: I was able to remove the dependency on "Legacy of the Dragonborn" master file. 

Credit:
Bethesda
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2846158]icecreamassassin[/url] (for Legacy of the Dragonborn) (Just going to leave this link here and also the one above due to its sheer awesomeness! ;) )
AbraxasMorte88 (me, for the fix)

I don't see any harm in using this in other mods without MY permission. Credit is always nice, though ;)
author: AbraxasMorte88

files.name: SteelNordicGauntletsFix v1.1
files.changelogHtml:
Removed dependency on "Legacy of the Dragonborn" as a master.
ALL DLCs are STILL required.
